snippet.title: Near Mint - A roguelike deckbuilder where your cards have been torn into pieces!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://henriforshort.itch.io/near-mint?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Fight your way through an occult dungeon, while building a deck of cards that seem to have been forgotten in the drier...

Your deck is composed only of decaying cards that were split into three parts. No problem! Re-assemble them however you want to create powerful synergies... Or really bad ones.

Each battle will reward you with a new card to add to your deck. But your foes also grow stronger each time. How far will you get?

➡️ More from Henri Couvreur https://henriforshort.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More roguelike games https://itch.io/games/tag-roguelike?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
